column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////I had the Tiramisu pancakes
column2: and they were among the most decadent things in the history of breakfast
column3: almost TOO much even.  Service was incredibly friendly
column4: despite the huge crowd.  I plan on going back next time I'm in Chicago
column5: because there were just too many creative things on this menu that I want to try.
